channel.title: Achievement ideas
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/profile?user=BlackMesaSourceMedia&view=videos#play/uploads/1/lgtyBqnR2uc[/url] (hope the link works)
If you look at the very end of satchel fx whoever is playing goes to the menu at he end were one of the options is [b]achivements[/b]. devs: is this proof of achivements in BM, a mistake, or something from the EP2 menu or something like that.
ps- sorry if this has already come up, but I've never seen a thread on this exact topic(although there was one pre-crash in the suggestion box asking people to post ideas for achivements(which I may rebuild)) and the FAQ says nothing about achivements.
pps- I am aware this is alpha material, but I think it's worth asking anyways.

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
“Half” Life - Finish Black Mesa on hard, with exactly 50 Life left.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
ZCOverload:

For one thing, I think a pretty cool achievement would be an easter egg with a Combine gas mask in a secret room in Xen. Also, I recall in OpFor, there was an easter egg with a room full of Chumtoads. There should be a similar easter egg in one of the BM maps.

Why would there be a Combine gas mask in Xen? They probably haven’t even been invented yet (the Combine gas masks, not the Combine).

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: Sergeant_Guthrie
item.description:
well…i may be late but i want to put my 2 cents in…

“Clever girl”--------die from a female assassin’s bullet while facing another enemy.

and some of the best ones i’ve seen

time paradox- die before you get the H.E.V suit

Starship Trooper - Kill 1000 cockroaches

who ya Gonna Call? Kill a Controller with the Gluon Gun.

HAAX! Cause the Guard’s Computer to Blue Screen

Ghostbuster Kill the Nihilanth with a beam from the gluon gun

“Yes. I’m the one who discovered that the border world is EXTREMELY lactose intolerant.”:
Place a delicious wedge of Bournes pasteurised organic Cheshire cheese found in the cafeteria into the anti-mass spectrometer.

Frohwned - Don’t insert the Bournes pasturised organic Chesire cheese into the anti-mass spectrometer.

Man With No Name - Kill 6 marines in a row with the magnum, without reloading.

Those Ridiculous Ties - Kill 5 scientists by damaging only their chests.

Rocky - Hit all the meat in the meat locker.

Dirty Garry - Shoot a physics prop with the magnum, causing it to fall on and kill an enemy.

“SMILE you son of a-!” kill an ichthy with a grenade

One Thing’s for Sure: I’m Gonna be a lot Thinner! Escape the Trash Compactor.

.H.H.O.A: Cook the Hand Grenade for three seconds before killing three enemy players with it. Five seconds is right out.

Use The Force, Gordon…: Shoot a rocket directly up and use the guiding system to drop it onto the head of an unseen enemy.

Emo - Suicide in every possible way.

X Counts of Self-Defence (X being all the soldiers you can kill in the mod)

Going to Need a Bigger Boat - Kill the first Icthyosaur

You Got FROHWNED
Teamkill a scientist by throwing a bicycle prop at him(if there is one)
OR
Teamkill yourself and multiple people around you by acting like Gordon Frohman
OR
Cause the scientist to fall off the tram platform

Questionable Ethnics - Cause a black character to produce gibs with the wrong skin tone.

Freeman’s Mind
Speak through your microphone almost continually the entire game.

Where there’s a gun there’s fun---------

take the glock from the dead security guard.

I Ate The Donuts
Kill a scientist while he’s saying “Do you know who ate all the donuts?”

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: Eion_Kilant_739
item.description:
ZCOverload:

Oh yeah, that’s right. I’ve only played the original HL1 so I wasn’t sure of the expansions. I remember reading about the easter eggs though.

Yes, the easter eggs are the best part. I’d love to find a room added with the Xen update that is similar in nature to the Tribute Room in Halo: Reach.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: ZCOverload
item.description:
Disturbulator:

It was blueshift.
Blueshift is the one with the Xenian Chumtoad layer.

In Opposing Force, if you deplete all Glueon Ammunition on the vent above the door to the Lambda Core, a toad falls out.

Oh yeah, that’s right. I’ve only played the original HL1 so I wasn’t sure of the expansions. I remember reading about the easter eggs though.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: ZCOverload
item.description:
For one thing, I think a pretty cool achievement would be an easter egg with a Combine gas mask in a secret room in Xen. Also, I recall in OpFor, there was an easter egg with a room full of Chumtoads. There should be a similar easter egg in one of the BM maps.

But if we don’t want to be serious we could always impliment the penguin grenade thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I don’t think that this thread was ever about serious suggestions about inclusion in the mod. Mostly a way to have fun with achievement ideas. But, go ahead and provide your suggestions for Xenian achievements. Who knows, maybe a dev will like the idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: ZCOverload
item.description:
I’ll miss squashing those little guys…

Still, aren’t all the achievements decided on by now? I remember reading that quite a few pages back. Shouldn’t we think of some for the Xen update? (Otherwise known as Black Mesa: Episode One, in my mind at least).

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement ideas
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Sir Edmund Allenby:

https://www.facebook.com/events/179981922137074/181383078663625/?notif_t=event_mall_comment

Achievement #1 there won’t be possible. The cockroaches are now particle effects and are, therefore, unstompable.

Read full topic
